notes: Wolf extends LocatableShape+Drawable. ROAMING/CHASING with 40% hysteresis. Driven by existing physicsTimer (no new Timer). wolfCount=max(0,(diff-1)/2). Collision calls sheep.die(). Wolf warning label in hunger panel: red<150px, orange<400px.

Post-review fixes: wolves field initialized at declaration (ArrayList); Random field initialized once at declaration, removed re-instantiation in createNewObject(); difficultyLevel clamped before Sheep constructor and all usages use this.difficultyLevel; Wolf.draw() Color objects extracted as static final constants; SheepHungerPanel warning thresholds now derived from wolf.getDetectionRadius() instead of magic numbers (red=within detectRadius, orange=within 1.5x detectRadius).

BUG-1: idle recovery now divides by fatigueScale (was multiplying). LOW-1: createNewObject() checks isOverlapingRestingSpots() before adding Grass/Water. LOW-2: RestingSpot.restPower now difficulty-scaled via constructor param: max(0.5, 2.0/(1+(diff-1)*0.08)). LOW-3: per-spot 20-attempt retry budget replaces shared pool. LOW-4: onRestSpot boolean field on Sheep, set by SheepGame.checkCollisions(), skips idle recovery in tick() when on rest spot. NIT-1: removed redundant implements Drawable from RestingSpot. NIT-3: stamina bar uses Math.round() instead of cast truncation.
